Detailed Description

Interface used to allow the creator of a dialog to run some code when the dialog is dismissed.

The following example demonstrates how to use the IDialogOnDismissListener. 

  //You need implement your owner OnDismiss Listener for Dialog
  class MyDialogOnDismissListener : gaia::core::IDialogOnDismissListener {
    public:
      MyDialogOnDismissListener();
      virtual ~MyDialogOnDismissListener();
      virtual void onDismiss();
  };

  void MyDialogOnDismissListener::onDismiss() {
      //When dialog is dismiss, will use the callback to notify you.
      . . . .
  }

  //In your dialog, just register the callback by registerOnDismissListener
  MyDialogBox* dialog = new MyDialogBox(page);
  MyDialogOnDismissListener* listener = new MyDialogOnDismissListener();
  if (listener == NULL) {
      //DialogOnDismissListener create failure!!
      return;
  }

  if (dialog != NULL) {
    dialog->registerOnDismissListener(listener);
  }
